name: Pixelbox Films
description:
Our friendly producers and project managers are on hand to guide you through the entire production process, from conception through to completion, and will ensure your final video is delivered on time, meets your requirements and exceeds your expectations. Our clients use the films we create to communicate with customers and employees, raise brand awareness, improve internal communications, increase sales and win new business.
Our team of talented producers, editors and camera operators have over 10 years experience producing videos for some of the biggest companies in the world including the BBC, Google, Nokia, Barclays and Nissan. The Pixelbox team work on projects of all sizes, so whether you're looking for a camera man for one day, or you need a large scale international production - we can help. We work worldwide and run a 24/7 service - so we really can help you wherever or whenever you need us.
